content: you will need a tapestry needle for sewing and weaving in ends garment is made from twelve panels of various shades as per instructions it is suggested that you label each panel for ease at the time of finishing finished measurements chest circumference 44 4 47 2 51 2 55 2 113 120 130 140 cm finished length 23 6 23 6 24 2 24 2 60 60 61 5 61 5 cm sleeve seam 16 9 43 cm for all sizes yarn used wool and the gang alpachino merino a 1 1 2 2 balls b 3 balls for all sizes c 2 2 2 3 balls d 1 1 2 2 balls e 2 balls for all sizes f 2 balls for all sizes
